entries.title: High-Level Pentagon Official Used Racial Slurs, Drank on Job, Sexually Harassed Employees: Watchdog
entries.description:
The unusual investigation into former Defense deputy CFO Douglas Glenn follows Biden administration pledge to root out racism in the workplace.

The post High-Level Pentagon Official Used Racial Slurs, Drank on Job, Sexually Harassed Employees: Watchdog appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Empire by Invitation
entries.description:
African leaders are asking for more U.S. counterterrorism support. They should be careful what they wish for.

The post Empire by Invitation appeared first on The Intercept.

entries.title: Unredacted NIH Emails Show Efforts to Rule Out Lab Origin of Covid
entries.description:
Virologists close to the NIH initially believed the Covid virus could be genetically engineered. Unredacted emails show how their thinking evolved.

The post Unredacted NIH Emails Show Efforts to Rule Out Lab Origin of Covid appeared first on The Intercept.
